nodes.text: Haugg Nerf Industries, founded by the criminal Groff Haugg, was one of Coruscants largest nerf-meat processing companies during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The corporation served as a front for many of Groff's criminal activities, including the production of brainwashing death sticks. These death sticks were shipped to various regions of the galaxy inside the nerf-meat containers. The plant was located in Coruscant's industrial district.
